definition: The Drunken Beauty, Qing Dynasty Beijing opera
drunk driving (very high blood alcohol concentration)

sentences.english: Drunken people often have slurred speech.
sentences.chinese: 喝醉酒的人说话时经常含糊不清。

sentences.english: The drunken man lurched along toward me.
sentences.chinese: 一个喝醉酒的人沿街踉跄而行。

sentences.english: I watched the "Drunken Beauty" with Aunt Shirley days ago.
sentences.chinese: 前几天我和雪莉阿姨一起看了“贵妃醉酒”。

sentences.english: Some of the effects of short-term sleep deprivation can be very similar to the effects of being drunk.
sentences.chinese: 短期睡眠剥夺的某些影响与醉酒的后果类似。
醉酒使得这位绅士丢人现眼。

sentences.english: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;
sentences.chinese: 不要醉酒，酒能使人放荡，乃要被圣灵充满。

sentences.english: When he does appear, he is almost always in a drunken stupor .
sentences.chinese: 当他看来，他几乎一直是在喝醉酒的木僵。

sentences.english: Too white 63 years old drunk with wine be drowned but die, is to want to get moon not necessarily.
sentences.chinese: 太白六十三岁醉酒溺水而死，不一定是想捞月亮。

sentences.english: The driver of the red car will be charged with the crime of drunk driving.
sentences.chinese: 红旗轿车的司机将被落案控以醉酒驾驶罪。

sentences.english: Mum: Why did some guys like to drive so fast when they are drunken?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有些家伙就是喜欢喝醉酒又开得很快呢？

sentences.english: He would bring in his Queen and show her off in front of this drunken mob.
sentences.chinese: 他要王后前来，在这群醉酒之徒面前炫耀她的美貌。

sentences.english: The 28-year-old man has been charged with impaired driving.
sentences.chinese: 该名28岁男子已经被指控为醉酒驾车。

sentences.english: You call me up drunk, does the fun ever start?
sentences.chinese: 你醉酒还打我电话，到底有完没完？

sentences.english: Particularly pay attention on the madman or drunk man in hotel to prevent any accidents.
sentences.chinese: 注意发现和防止精神病患者，醉酒者在酒店滋事。

sentences.english: A day night, difficult Ma Jie knew Rong Zi of woman of a gassed.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上，难马结识了一名喝醉酒的女子荣子。

sentences.english: Product such as seen WenYan drunkenness, busy put him to bed sit.
sentences.chinese: 品如见文彦醉酒，忙把他扶上床坐着。

definition: after drinking/under the influence of alcohol
dead drunk/as drunk as a lord
to get drunk and act crazy/roaring drunk
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
drunk driving (very high blood alcohol concentration)
to dissipate the effects of alcohol/to sober up
